origin.origins-factions.giant.name: Giant
origin.origins-factions.giant.descriptio: You are 50% larger. +Health but slower movement
origin.origins-factions.dwarf.name: Dwarf
origin.origins-factions.dwarf.descriptio: You are 30% smaller. Fast mining but less health
origin.origins-factions.ninja.name: Samurai
origin.origins-factions.ninja.descriptio: Speed and tactical invisibility, but fragile
origin.origins-factions.hoplite.name: Hoplite
origin.origins-factions.hoplite.descript: +10 hearts and temporary resistance, but slow movement
origin.origins-factions.berserker.name: Berserker
origin.origins-factions.berserker.descri: +50% physical damage and temporary rage, but cannot use shields
origin.origins-factions.icarus.name: Icarus
origin.origins-factions.icarus.descripti: Immune to fall damage, but vulnerable to water and fire
origin.origins-factions.grasshopper.name: Grasshopper
origin.origins-factions.grasshopper.desc: High jump and reduced fall damage, but accelerated hunger
origin.origins-factions.golem_lava.name: Lava Golem
origin.origins-factions.golem_lava.descr: Fire resistant, faster in the Nether, but damaged by water
origin.origins-factions.end_citizen.name: End Citizen
origin.origins-factions.end_citizen.desc: Enderman height, teleportation, enderman immunity, but water damage
origin.origins-factions.young_warden.des: Night vision in darkness, spectral attack, but blind in light
power.origins-factions.giant/size.name: Giant Size
power.origins-factions.giant/size.descri: Your body is 1.5 times larger than normal
power.origins-factions.dwarf/size.name: Dwarf Size
power.origins-factions.dwarf/size.descri: Your body is 30% smaller than normal
power.origins-factions.young_warden/ward: Blind in light, night vision in darkness
power.origins-factions.young_warden/spec: Attacks apply glowing effect to enemies
power.origins-factions.golem_lava/nether: Increased movement speed in the Nether
power.origins-factions.young_warden/armo: Cannot wear netherite armor but gain extra protection
power.origins-factions.icarus/icarus_das: You dash through the air (Press Active Key)
power.origins-factions.icarus/icarus_fal: You don't receive damage when falling
